incident_review.root_cause: Connection leak in exception handler due to incomplete try-with-resources pattern

action_items.action: Add connection leak detection to CI/CD
Review all DAO implementations for similar issues

lessons_learned: Gradual degradation is harder to detect than sudden failures
Connection pool metrics should be prominently displayed
Database-dependent services need circuit breaker implementation
Resource exhaustion testing should be part of release validation
